Snippet.Use Case: Enable a Parameter to control the Run Step Change History feature.
Snippet.Example: A user wants the Change Reason dialog to not be displayed when a step is changed during its initial execution session.
Comments: Add the following parameter to the Project Parameter Policy file.
Set the parameter to Y in the project.

Parameters.Name: Skip Step Change History On First Execution
Parameters.Description: Setting this parameter to Y will cause VERA to not require a Change Reason or update the Change History field when an executed run step is changed within the same session where it was executed initially.
